short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension checks if Twitter Cards link to the domain shown in the Twitter Cards.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Twitter cards may direct users to a different domain than the one displayed on the card.
This extension checks whether a Twitter card links to the domain displayed on the Twitter card.
and shows a dialog for confirmation when a user clicks the card linked to a different domain than the one displayed on the card. 

Change logs
(0.1.3)
  - improve logic for getting domain text in the cards
(0.1.2)
  - fix logic for getting domain text in the cards
(0.1.1)
  - change fetch credentials in background.ts for appropriate redirecting
